root: ^PLEASE FIX THE OIL SPILL. IT IS STARTING TO RUIN THE SURROUNDING WATER OF MY DOMAIN. MY LITTLE CREATURES NEED WATER TO LIVE. I AM STILL RECOVERING FROM MY INJURIES. THANK YOU FOR ASKING (BEWARE OF SARCASM).
^ALSO COULD YOU PLEASE STOP MAKING MORE MUSHROOMS? THEIR SPORES ARE STARTING TO MAKE MY CREATURES MAKE THESE SEMI-AUTONOMOUS, CONVULSIVE EXPULSIONS OF AIR THROUGH THEIR MOUTHS AND NOSES.
